content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) processing iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing resources.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring resources to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Entities Due to Collision
- Ensure that there is enough space and no existing entities blocking the placement of new entities. Consider increasing spacing, changing direction, or adjusting the reference position to avoid collisions.

### Errors Due to Lack of Resources
- Before attempting to insert items into an entity, ensure that the required resources are available in your inventory to avoid insertion errors.
